## JsPlumbInstance.each() method

Execute the given function for each of the given elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
each(spec: T["E"] | Array<T["E"]>, fn: (e: T["E"]) => any): JsPlumbInstance;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  spec | T\["E"\] \| Array&lt;T\["E"\]&gt; | An Element, or an element id, or an array of elements/element ids. |
|  fn | (e: T\["E"\]) =&gt; any | The function to run on each element. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[JsPlumbInstance](./core.jsplumbinstance.md)
